Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to your needs, as it has been assessed to be worth $1500000 to you. I am extending this unique chance to purchase the product directly from us at a special introductory price of $1250000. This offer is designed to provide you with an unparalleled advantage and significant savings, making it a truly compelling proposition. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and beneficial for your endeavors. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
